title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the text does not move.
EB: The expected behavior is that the ShiftLeft command should align the lines visually by removing the tab character in the first line and shifting the second line to the left. It is confusing when there is a stray space preventing the text from shifting.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a default text editor. 
2. Type in the following lines: 
   - Some text
   - Some text2
3. Highlight the two lines and execute the ShiftLeft command. 
   - Note that nothing moves.
